column1: Local Foods////Local Foods knows how to make high quality healthy food
column2: without compromising flavor! I got to try their crunchy chicken sandwich
column4: and the chicken posole. Every item was absolutely delicious
column5: with the two sandwiches being the real standouts! The crunchy chicken was just the right balance of sweet and salty. The truffled egg salad was creamy
column7: and full of flavor (the truffle flavor was phenomenal). The cherry on top were the fresh baked pretzel buns
column8: which held up nicely and provided just the right wrapping for all of the ingredients. Some of the best sandwiches I've had!!! The posole was fresh and flavorful as well. Very similar to a tortilla soup. Overall
column9: this is a great spot for fresh ingredients
